channel.title: Foolbox on The Working R Programmer
channel.description: Recent content in Foolbox on The Working R Programmer

item.title: Lots of Function Transformations
item.description: The last couple of days I’ve been doing a lot of experimenting with a package for function rewriting: foolbox. I am doing some function transformations in both pmatch and tailr and they look very much alike, so I figured I should collect the shared functionality in a separate package.
